column1: She wanted to understand, among other things, what the major causes were of black unemployment, which became the topic of her dissertation.

Collecting my own data and e mploying some of the data and discoveries of economics over the ensuing decades gathered at G eorgia College â€™s library, I researched the major causes of African American unemployment.

While much of my research relates to various aspects of economic growth  - 7 - and innovation, I have spent time in various roles addressing why few women and people of color enter and advance in the economics profession, which is related to my research on patent teams.
